welcome.tittle: ğŸ‘‹ Hello, welcome to Bot Framework!
welcome.subtittle: If you want to start over, just write "**%s**" at any time. Stuck and don't know what to say? Type "**help**" and I'll tell you some hints. You may also ask me questions about the trained subject in QnA Maker.

greeting.cityPrompt: Hello %s, what city do you live in?
greeting.validateName: Names need to be at least %s characters long.
greeting.validateCity: City names needs to be at least %s characters long.
greeting.greetUser1: Hi {userName}, from {userCity}, nice to meet you!
greeting.greetUser2: You can always say "My name is <your name>" or "I live in <your city>" to reintroduce yourself to me.

help.introduction: Let me try to provide some help:
help.restart: - Type "**%s**" if you want to start over.
help.capabilities: - Ask me things I can help you with such as: "**Hi**", "**Hello**" or "**Good morning**".
help.cancel: - Write "**Cancel**" if you change your mind while I'm requesting some information.
help.qna: - I also understand questions about the trained subject in QnA Maker, like "**What is a chatbot?**".

cancel.prompt: Are you sure you want to cancel? ğŸ˜®
cancel.confirmed: Ok, let's start over. ğŸ‘ How would you like to continue?
cancel.nothing: I don't have anything to cancel ğŸ˜…
